#!/usr/bin/env ruby -wKU
def pretty(number) number.to_s.gsub(/\d{1,3}(?=\d{3}+(?!\d))/, '\0,') end
counts = `wc -lwc`.scan(/\d+/) counts[0] = counts[0].to_i + 1 # increase one to the line count
%w[ line word byte ].each do |unit| cnt = counts.shift plural = cnt.to_i != 1 ? 's' : '' printf("%11.11s %s%s\n", pretty(cnt), unit, plural) end
